title.en: Ookami Kachou no Kiss wa Amai - Reitetsu Joushi no Ura no Kao

altTitles.ja-ro: Ookami Kachou no Kiss wa Amai - Reitetsu Joushi no Ura no Kao

altTitles.ja: オオカミ課長のキスは甘い～冷徹上司の裏の顔～

description.en:
Haruka Usami is a 24-year-old office worker who is known for her hard work and diligence. Her boss is the wolf-like Chief Ogami, who has a keen eye. She is almost discouraged by his strictness, but she is doing her best to pay off the debt left behind by her ex-boyfriend. She has started a side job as a stuffed animal that she can hide her face behind the company's ban on side jobs, and just as she is about to start her side job, she runs into her boss. There, he happens to hear the Chief's sudden true intention of "wanting to nurture his valued subordinate" and "he's a hard worker"! He is really just a clumsy, kind, and sincere person. Usami finds this gap cute, but even though she likes him, she can't reveal her true identity...!　An office love story about falling in love with a clumsy wolf boss!

(google translated)
